comment: Чорда, сидящая на троне. После фразы огнеметчики сжигают подсудимых

languages.text: "Ложь! Я вижу скверну, обуявшую ваше естество, невооруженным глазом. Лишь избавительное пламя способно очистить вас. Виновны!"

traits.locale_text: "Ложь! Я вижу скверну, обуявшую ваше естество, невооруженным глазом. Лишь избавительное пламя способно очистить вас. Виновны!"

languages.text: "Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"
languages.original_text: "Ложь! Я вижу скверну, обуявшую ваше естество, невооруженным глазом. Лишь избавительное пламя способно очистить вас. Виновны!"

traits.locale_text: "Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"
"Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"
"Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"
"Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"
"Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"
"Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"

languages.text: “你说谎！我已经清楚地看到了你们灵魂中的腐化。如今，只有净化之火能赦免你的罪过了。有罪！”
languages.original_text: "Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"

traits.locale_text: “你说谎！我已经清楚地看到了你们灵魂中的腐化。如今，只有净化之火能赦免你的罪过了。有罪！”

languages.text: 「嘘だ！私はこの肉眼で、お前を飲み込んだ腐敗が明確に見える。浄化の炎のみが、お前を解き放つ事ができる。お前は有罪だ！」
languages.original_text: "Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"

traits.locale_text: 「嘘だ！私はこの肉眼で、お前を飲み込んだ腐敗が明確に見える。浄化の炎のみが、お前を解き放つ事ができる。お前は有罪だ！」

languages.text: «¡Mentira! Puedo ver a simple vista la corrupción que ha envuelto su naturaleza. Solo el fuego purificador puede absolverle. ¡Culpable!».
languages.original_text: "Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mentira! Puedo ver a simple vista la corrupción que ha envuelto su naturaleza. Solo el fuego purificador puede absolverle. ¡Culpable!».

languages.text: "Lügen! Ich sehe mit nacktem Auge ganz deutlich die Verderbnis, die Besitz von Eurem Wesen ergriffen hat. Nur das läuternde Feuer kann Euch noch retten. Schuldig!"
languages.original_text: "Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"

traits.locale_text: "Lügen! Ich sehe mit nacktem Auge ganz deutlich die Verderbnis, die Besitz von Eurem Wesen ergriffen hat. Nur das läuternde Feuer kann Euch noch retten. Schuldig!"

languages.text: « Mensonges ! Je vois bien que la corruption s'est emparée de vous. Seul le feu purificateur peut vous absoudre, désormais. Coupable ! »
languages.original_text: "Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"

traits.locale_text: « Mensonges ! Je vois bien que la corruption s'est emparée de vous. Seul le feu purificateur peut vous absoudre, désormais. Coupable ! »

languages.text: "Yalan! Çıplak gözle görebiliyorum: Yozlaşma, tabiatını içine çekip yutmuş. Seni artık yalnızca ateşin arındırıcılığı kurtarabilir. Suçlu bulunmuştur!"
languages.original_text: "Lies! I see clearly, with my naked eye, the corruption that has engulfed your nature. Only the cleansing fire can absolve you now. Guilty!"

traits.locale_text: "Yalan! Çıplak gözle görebiliyorum: Yozlaşma, tabiatını içine çekip yutmuş. Seni artık yalnızca ateşin arındırıcılığı kurtarabilir. Suçlu!"
